01_01.question: Which of the following is an express middleware for parsing form fields?

01_02.question: Which of the following is an express middleware for hosting static files (ex: images, css) in the /public/ folder?

01_03.question:
Given the following block of code:

A user named Lalita, opens a browser and goes to the home page URL: / (1 page hit).

Later, another user, Mirek, opens a browser and goes to the home page URL: / (1 page hit) and then refreshes the browser once (1 more page hit).

Assuming no other page hits by any other users - what is the output of Mirek's browser (on the last page hit)?

A.choice: You have visited this page 0 times!

B.choice: You have visited this page 1 times!

C.choice: You have visited this page 2 times!

D.choice: You have visited this page 3 times!

E.choice: You have visited this page 4 times!

F.choice: You have visited this page 5 times!

G.choice: You have visited this page 6 times!

01_04.question:
Given the following block of code:

A user named Akbar, opens a browser and goes to the home page URL: / (1 page hit) and then refreshes the browser twice (2 more page hits).

Later, another user, Yoko, opens a browser and goes to the home page URL: / (1 page hit) and then refreshes the browser twice (2 more page hits).

Assuming no other page hits by any other users - what is the output of Yoko's browser (on the last page hit)?

A.choice: You have visited this page 0 times!

B.choice: You have visited this page 1 times!

C.choice: You have visited this page 2 times!

D.choice: You have visited this page 3 times!

E.choice: You have visited this page 4 times!

F.choice: You have visited this page 5 times!

G.choice: You have visited this page 6 times!

01_05.question:
Which of the following blocks of code, correctly creates a route that would generate this content:

Welcome Zhubin!

When going to the following URL: /hello/?var=Zhubin

01_06.question:
Which of the following blocks of code, correctly creates a route that would generate this content:

Go Team Red!

When going to the following URL: /team/Red/

01_07.question:
Which of the following blocks of code, correctly creates a route for:

1. The home page at URL: / with content: Home Page AND

2. A "page not found" page for all other pages (ex: /doesnotexist AND /dne): with content: Page not found
